content: We've noticed what we think is a difference in the SUSHI/IGPublisher integration, but we want to confirm it really is different (as opposed to faulty memories). Can someone remind me how to find and download previous versions of the publisher so we can investigate? (I tried to find this info on Zulip, but failed).
I go to the commiters/notication java Publisher thread and click on the link for a particular version
@ Bob Milius -- of course! Now why didn't I think of that?!
